Translations.Text: Avaru hadaganneruvaga, nistheyannella allahanige misalagittu avanige more iduttare. Konege avanu avarannu raksisi dadakke talupisidaga avaru (tam'ma nistheyalli) itararannu palugolisuttare
avarige navu enannu nidiruvevo adakkella krtaghnate toralikkagi mattu moju maduttiralikkagi (avaru hige maduttare). Bahu begane avarige (i dhoraneya phalitansa) tiliyalide

avara suttamuttalina pradesagalalli janara apaharana nadeyuttiruvaga navu i pavitra sthalavannu (makkahvannu) prasanta sthalavagisiruvudannu avarenu noduttillave? Avarenu, mithyavannu nambi allahana anugrahagalige krtaghnate toruttareye
allahana mele sullaropa horisuva athava tanna balige satyavu bandaga adannu sullennuvataniginta dodda akrami yariddane? Dhikkarigaligenu narakadalli nele illave
namagagi sramisuvavarige navu nam'ma margagalannu torisikodutteve. Mattu allahanu khandita satkarmigala jotegiddane
pakkada nadinalli (idu sambhaviside). Mattu avaru tam'ma i solina balika matte vijayigalaguvaru
kelavu varsagalalli (idu sambhavisalide). Naija adhikaravu adakkinta hindeyu, anantaravu allahanige seriruttade. Visvasigalu sambhramisuva dinavondu baralide
allahana neravininda (a dina baralide). Avanu tanicchisidavarige neravaguttane. Avanu pracandanu karunaluvu agiruttane
idu allahana vagdana. Allahanu tanu nidida vagdanavannu endu ullanghisuvudilla. Adare heccina janaru tilidilla
